channel.title: P16 question
channel.description: how do i make myself owner/admin on p16 ive been looking all over for it in the client.java and i have had no success in finding it,i updated my player rites in the character file but i cant use any of the admin or owner commands, so i just need to know how to locate it in the client.java

the commands might be not working so you may need to fix the commands

item.title: P16 question
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

yes i understand that but after doing that i still cant use commands such as ::pickup or ::xteleto and things like that

Read full topic

item.title: P16 question
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Look for the “Characters” Folder

Open the Account/Name You want to change to admin or mod

Look for this part:

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3214 character-posy = 3426 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1 character-lastlogin = 20061008 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 40318

And edit the (character-rights = 0) to character-rights = 3 for owner to character-rights = 2 for Admin or character-rights = 1 for Mod

Read full topic
